content: While Helios, the virtual target projection system developed by Hyperlab, can certainly be used to improve skills and techniques for a variety of sports, including basketball and tennis, it could also be useful for training in badminton. The system is designed to help athletes enhance their courtcraft, footwork, reflexes, and agility, which are all important skills for badminton players. With its engaging and gamified training experience, Helios could provide badminton players with an effective and fun way to improve their performance.
